## Discussion

The following values are used to specify a binding to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/bind(_:to:withKeyPath:options:)], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/infoForBinding(_:)], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/unbind(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/valueClassForBinding(_:)]. See [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/CocoaBindingsRef/CocoaBindingsRef.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000189i] for more information.

---

# NSBindingName

**Structure**

Values that specify a binding for certain methods.

## Declaration

```swift
struct NSBindingName
```

## Discussion

The following values are used to specify a binding to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/bind(_:to:withKeyPath:options:)], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/infoForBinding(_:)], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/unbind(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/valueClassForBinding(_:)]. See [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/CocoaBindingsRef/CocoaBindingsRef.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000189i] for more information.

## Binding Names

- **alignment**: A constant that identifies an alignment binding.
- **alternateImage**: A constant that identifies an alternate image binding.
- **alternateTitle**: A constant that identifies an alternate title binding.
- **animate**: A constant that identifies an animate binding.
- **animationDelay**: A constant that identifies an animation delay binding.
- **argument**: A constant that identifies an argument binding.
- **attributedString**: A constant that identifies an attributed string binding.
- **content**: A constant that identifies a content binding.
- **contentArray**: A constant that identifies a content array binding.
- **contentArrayForMultipleSelection**: A constant that identifies a content array for multiple selection binding.
- **contentDictionary**: A constant that identifies a content dictionary binding.
- **contentHeight**: A constant that identifies a content height binding.
- **contentObject**: A constant that identifies a content object binding.
- **contentObjects**: A constant that identifies a content objects binding.
- **contentSet**: A constant that identifies a content set binding.
- **contentValues**: A constant that identifies a content values binding.
- **contentWidth**: A constant that identifies a content width binding.
- **criticalValue**: A constant that identifies a critical value binding.
- **data**: A constant that identifies a data binding.
- **displayPatternTitle**: A constant that identifies a display pattern title binding.
- **displayPatternValue**: A constant that identifies a display pattern value binding.
- **documentEdited**: A constant that identifies a document edited binding.
- **doubleClickArgument**: A constant that identifies a double-click argument binding.
- **doubleClickTarget**: A constant that identifies a double-click target binding.
- **editable**: A constant that identifies an editable binding.
- **enabled**: A constant that identifies an enabled binding.
- **excludedKeys**: A constant that identifies an excluded keys binding.
- **filterPredicate**: A constant that identifies a filter predicate binding.
- **font**: A constant that identifies a font binding.
- **fontBold**: A constant that identifies a font bold binding.
- **fontFamilyName**: A constant that identifies a font family name binding.
- **fontItalic**: A constant that identifies a font italic binding.
- **fontName**: A constant that identifies a font name binding.
- **fontSize**: A constant that identifies a font size binding.
- **headerTitle**: A constant that identifies a header title binding.
- **hidden**: A constant that identifies a hidden binding.
- **image**: A constant that identifies an image binding.
- **includedKeys**: A constant that identifies an included keys binding.
- **initialKey**: A constant that identifies an initial key binding.
- **initialValue**: A constant that identifies an initial value binding.
- **isIndeterminate**: A constant that identifies an is indeterminate binding.
- **label**: A constant that identifies a label binding.
- **localizedKeyDictionary**: A constant that identifies a localized key dictionary binding.
- **managedObjectContext**: A constant that identifies a managed object context binding.
- **maxValue**: A constant that identifies a maximum value binding.
- **maxWidth**: A constant that identifies a maximum width binding.
- **maximumRecents**: A constant that identifies a maximum recents binding.
- **minValue**: A constant that identifies a minimum value binding.
- **minWidth**: A constant that identifies a minimum width binding.
- **mixedStateImage**: A constant that identifies a mixed state image binding.
- **offStateImage**: A constant that identifies an off state image binding.
- **onStateImage**: A constant that identifies an on state image binding.
- **positioningRect**: A constant that identifies a positioning rectangle binding.
- **predicate**: A constant that identifies a predicate binding.
- **recentSearches**: A constant that identifies a recent searches binding.
- **representedFilename**: A constant that identifies a represented filename binding.
- **rowHeight**: A constant that identifies a row height binding.
- **selectedIdentifier**: A constant that identifies a selected identifier binding.
- **selectedIndex**: A constant that identifies a selected index binding.
- **selectedLabel**: A constant that identifies a selected label binding.
- **selectedObject**: A constant that identifies a selected object binding.
- **selectedObjects**: A constant that identifies a selected objects binding.
- **selectedTag**: A constant that identifies a selected tag binding.
- **selectedValue**: A constant that identifies a selected value binding.
- **selectedValues**: A constant that identifies a selected values binding.
- **selectionIndexPaths**: A constant that identifies a selection index paths binding.
- **selectionIndexes**: A constant that identifies a selection indexes binding.
- **sortDescriptors**: A constant that identifies a sort descriptors binding.
- **target**: A constant that identifies a target binding.
- **textColor**: A constant that identifies a text color binding.
- **title**: A constant that identifies a title binding.
- **toolTip**: A constant that identifies a tool tip binding.
- **transparent**: A constant that identifies a transparent binding.
- **value**: A constant that identifies a value binding.
- **valuePath**: A constant that identifies a value path binding.
- **valueURL**: A constant that identifies a value URL binding.
- **visible**: A constant that identifies a visible binding.
- **warningValue**: A constant that identifies a warning value binding.
- **width**: A constant that identifies a width binding.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**
- **init(rawValue:)**

## Key-Value Data

- **NSDictionaryController**: A bindings-compatible controller that manages the display and editing of a dictionary of key-value pairs.
- **NSDictionaryControllerKeyValuePair**: A set of methods implemented by arranged objects to give access to information about those objects.
- **NSBindingOption**
- **NSBindingInfoKey**
- **NSIsControllerMarker(_:)**: Tests whether a given object is special marker object used for indicating the state of a selection in relation to a key.
- **NSKeyValueBindingCreation**: A set of methods that you can use to create and remove bindings between view objects and controllers, or between controllers and model objects.
- **Binding dictionary keys**: These constants define keys in the binding information dictionary.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
